title: Olivia Saves the Circus
description: Step into the ring with Olivia, where the lights are dim, the color soft, and a little girl's imagination is the main attraction.Olivia remembers her trip to the circus very well. The performers were out sick, so she had to do everything. She...-rode on a unicycle-jumped on a trampoline-juggled five balls!-tamed lions-and flew through the air.
author: Ian Falconer
